verses.verse: Then God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words, <WH1697> saying, <WH559>
"I am the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> who <WH834> brought <WH3318> you out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of slavery. <WH5650>
"You shall have <WH1961> no <WH3808> other <WH312> gods <WH430> before <WH5921> <WH6440> Me.

"You shall not make <WH6213> for yourself an idol, <WH6459> or any <WH3605> likeness <WH8544> of what <WH834> is in heaven <WH8064> above <WH4480> <WH4605> or on the earth <WH776> beneath <WH8478> or in the water <WH4325> under <WH8478> the earth. <WH776>

"You shall not worship <WH7812> them or serve <WH5647> them; for I, the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH410> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers on the children, <WH1> on the third <WH1121> and the fourth <WH8029> generations of those who hate <WH7256> Me,
but showing <WH6213> lovingkindness <WH2617> to thousands, <WH505> to those who love <WH157> Me and keep <WH8104> My commandments. <WH4687>

"You shall not take <WH5375> the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> in vain, <WH7723> for the Lord <WH3068> will not leave <WH5352> him unpunished <WH5352> who <WH834> takes <WH5375> His name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
"Remember <WH2142> the sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> to keep <WH6942> it holy. <WH6942>
"Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall labor <WH5647> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> your work, <WH4399>

but the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a sabbath <WH7676> of the Lord <WH3068> your God; <WH430> [in it] you shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work, <WH4399> you or your son <WH1121> or your daughter, <WH1323> your male <WH5650> or your female <WH519> servant <WH5650> <WH519> or your cattle <WH929> or your sojourner <WH1616> who <WH834> stays with you.

"For in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the Lord <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens <WH8064> and the earth, <WH776> the sea <WH3220> and all <WH3605> that is in them, and rested <WH5117> on the seventh <WH7637> day; <WH3117> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the Lord <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> and made <WH6942> it holy. <WH6942>
"Honor <WH3513> your father and your mother, <WH1> that your days <WH517> may be prolonged <WH3117> in the land <WH748> which <WH127> the Lord <WH834> your God <WH3068> gives <WH430> you.
"You shall not murder. <WH7523>
"You shall not commit <WH5003> adultery. <WH5003>
"You shall not steal. <WH1589>
"You shall not bear <WH6030> false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> against your neighbor. <WH7453>

"You shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor <WH7453>'s house; <WH1004> you shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor's wife <WH802> or his male <WH5650> servant <WH5650> or his female <WH519> servant <WH519> or his ox <WH7794> or his donkey <WH2543> or anything <WH3605> that belongs to your neighbor."

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> perceived <WH7200> the thunder <WH6963> and the lightning <WH3940> flashes <WH3940> and the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782> and the mountain <WH2022> smoking; <WH6226> and when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> [it,] they trembled <WH5128> and stood <WH5975> at a distance. <WH7350>
Then they said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Speak <WH1696> to us yourself <WH859> and we will listen; <WH8085> but let not God <WH430> speak <WH1696> to us, lest <WH6435> we die. <WH4191>"

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "Do not be afraid; <WH3372> for God <WH430> has come <WH935> in order <WH5668> to test <WH5254> you, and in order <WH5668> that the fear <WH3374> of Him may remain <WH1961> <WH6440> with you, so that you may not sin. <WH2398>"
So the people <WH5971> stood <WH5975> at a distance, <WH7350> while Moses <WH4872> approached <WH5066> the thick <WH6205> cloud <WH6205> where <WH834> <WH8033> God <WH430> [was.]

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Thus <WH3541> you shall say <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> 'You yourselves <WH9043> have seen <WH7200> that I have spoken <WH1696> to you from heaven. <WH8064>
'You shall not make <WH6213> [other gods <WH430>] besides <WH854> Me; gods <WH430> of silver <WH3701> or gods of gold, <WH2091> you shall not make <WH6213> for yourselves. <WH9043>

'You shall make <WH6213> an altar <WH4196> of earth <WH127> for Me, and you shall sacrifice <WH2076> on it your burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> and your peace <WH8002> offerings, <WH8002> your sheep <WH6629> and your oxen; <WH1241> in every <WH3605> place <WH4725> where <WH834> I cause My name <WH8034> to be remembered, <WH2142> I will come <WH935> to you and bless <WH1288> you.

'And if <WH518> you make <WH6213> an altar <WH4196> of stone <WH68> for Me, you shall not build <WH1129> it of cut <WH1496> stones, <WH1496> for if you wield <WH5130> your tool <WH2719> on it, you will profane <WH2490> it.
'And you shall not go <WH5927> up by steps <WH4609> to My altar, <WH4196> that your nakedness <WH6172> may not be exposed <WH1540> on it.'
